text: This felt like 2007 Shades of IoT to read, but is interesting. "Appliance garage" :joy: <https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2017-01-23/these-luxury-real-estate-staples-may-be-gone-in-20-years>

attachments.title: These Four Luxury Home Mainstays May Be Gone in 20 Years
attachments.text: Think open kitchens and huge master suites will always be desirable? Think again.
attachments.fallback: Bloomberg.com: These Four Luxury Home Mainstays May Be Gone in 20 Years
